ingredients.ingredient: 8 scoops ice cream, such as Market Pantry Vanilla Bean or Sea Salt Caramel Pretzel Ice Cream

cookingTips: Have ice cream ready to scoop before peaches finish cooking for best melting effect
Grill peaches over high heat for a few minutes on each side for caramelization
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to make a simple grilled peach sundae with melting ice cream
